She never had a lump this time and they actually treat her for gallstones before they did anything invasive. when they did it turns out that the cancer cells had spread over time to her gallbladder, liver, spine and pancreas. I'm not allowed HRT, as that's what they think caused my mam's BC in the first place! Ladies, men and all non binary folk, check, check and check again! Know and listen to your body and don't be scared to go to the doctors about anything, just go to put your mind at rest!! @ihartericka, I love your feed, I'm sorry I've waffled on! Big love to you xxx
